meanings.sent1: She was supercautious when crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent2: He always drives supercautiously, never going above the speed limit.
meanings.sent3: The supercautious squirrel double-checked every acorn before storing it away.
meanings.sent4: The detective's supercautious approach to the case uncovered crucial evidence.
meanings.sent5: The supercautious hiker meticulously checked each step on the treacherous trail.

meanings.sent1: The supercautious student always triple-checked his answers on the test.
meanings.sent2: She handled the fragile vase supercautiously, afraid it might break.
meanings.sent3: The supercautious cat cautiously approached the unfamiliar object in the room.
meanings.sent4: The supercautious decision to wait for more information paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The supercautious driver avoided the icy roads to prevent any accidents.
